mapper.select: SELECT notice_title,notice_task, notice_career,notice_qual, notice_position, DATE_FORMAT(notice_period, '%Y.%m.%d') as notice_period FROM notice ORDER BY notice_period DESC;

SELECT n.notice_title, n.notice_task, n.notice_career, n.notice_qual, n.notice_position, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_period, '%Y.%m.%d') as notice_period, j.job_code FROM notice n INNER JOIN job j ON n.job_id = j.job_id WHERE j.job_code = #{jobCode} ORDER BY n.notice_period DESC;
